export var HORIZONTAL_AXIS=['a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h'];export var VERTICAL_AXIS=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8];export var GRID_SIZE=100;export var TeamType;(function(TeamType){TeamType[TeamType["WHITE"]=0]="WHITE";TeamType[TeamType["BLACK"]=1]="BLACK";})(TeamType||(TeamType={}));export var PieceType;(function(PieceType){PieceType[PieceType["PAWN"]=0]="PAWN";PieceType[PieceType["BISHOP"]=1]="BISHOP";PieceType[PieceType["NIGHT"]=2]="NIGHT";PieceType[PieceType["ROOK"]=3]="ROOK";PieceType[PieceType["QUEEN"]=4]="QUEEN";PieceType[PieceType["KING"]=5]="KING";})(PieceType||(PieceType={}));export var initialBoardState=[];for(var p=0;p<2;p++){var type=p===0?'b':'w';var team=p===0?TeamType.BLACK:TeamType.WHITE;var y=p===0?7:0;// Rooks
initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/rook_".concat(type,".png"),x:0,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.ROOK,enPassantable:false,canCastle:true});initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/rook_".concat(type,".png"),x:7,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.ROOK,enPassantable:false,canCastle:true});// Nights
initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/night_".concat(type,".png"),x:1,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.NIGHT,enPassantable:false});initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/night_".concat(type,".png"),x:6,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.NIGHT,enPassantable:false});// Bishops
initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/bishop_".concat(type,".png"),x:2,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.BISHOP,enPassantable:false});initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/bishop_".concat(type,".png"),x:5,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.BISHOP,enPassantable:false});// Queens
initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/queen_".concat(type,".png"),x:3,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.QUEEN,enPassantable:false});// Kings
initialBoardState.push({image:"assets/images/king_".concat(type,".png"),x:4,y:y,team:team,type:PieceType.KING,enPassantable:false,canCastle:true});}// Pawns
for(var i=0;i<HORIZONTAL_AXIS.length;i++){initialBoardState.push({image:'assets/images/pawn_b.png',x:i,y:6,team:TeamType.BLACK,type:PieceType.PAWN,enPassantable:false});}for(var _i=0;_i<HORIZONTAL_AXIS.length;_i++){initialBoardState.push({image:'assets/images/pawn_w.png',x:_i,y:1,team:TeamType.WHITE,type:PieceType.PAWN,enPassantable:false});}
